description.value: You command your squadmates to act as a lethal firing squad. You and each squadmate affected by your commander's banner can attempt a ranged Strike as a reaction against a single target you designate; combine the damage from all attacks for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. If the designated target is a living creature, these attacks are death effects and gain the death trait. If the designated target dies as a result of this tactic, all other enemies within the affected area of your commander's banner must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)] save against your class DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.
